DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to determine the survival status of patients enrolled in study GLI01S (all-case observational study).
DOC.brief_title: Post-Marketing Surveillance of Long-Term Observation of Gliadel Wafer-Investigation of Vital Prognosis in Patients With High Grade Glioma
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Malignant Glioma, patients enrolled in study GLI01S. Exclusion criteria: Corresponding to contraindication of Gliadel. Not applicable to indications of Gliadel.
